card.name: Siphoning
card.description: Give a monster -2/-2 and the one in front of it +2/+2. If it killed, add a {{CARD:577|1}} to your deck.

description.now: Give a monster -2/-2 and the one in front of it +2/+2. If it killed, add a {{CARD:577|1}} to your deck.
description.prev: Heal 3 {{HP}}. Heal 1 extra {{HP}} per monster with {{KR}} on the board.
